name: Confident_Technologies
tag_list: it-security, security, authentication, verification, captcha, web-services
overview:
Confident Technologies, Inc. provides intuitive and secure image-based authentication solutions for consumer-facing Web applications.

Unique, image-based authentication solutions from Confident Technologies enable financial institutions, e-commerce providers, healthcare organizations, social networking sites, Web developers and other organizations to protect consumer and enterprise data during online transactions, increase conversion rates, improve Web site security, stop spam bots and provide a better user experience.

Confident Technologies provides image-based authentication and login solutions, out-of-band verification, and image-based CAPTCHA verification.

For more information, visit www.confidenttechnologies.com.
